source:
TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway's brow is furrowed in what you can only assume is a Loporrit's expression of grave concern.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>Règle spéciale<var 1D /var>:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
<var 1A 02 /var>* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe qui a servi à la commencer.<var 1A 01 /var>

Managingway se fait du souci pour un de ses congénères.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the foraging Loporrit at the Chlorophosgrot.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SEQ_01<tab>Parler au Loporrite leste, devant la grotte aux chlorophoi

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the foraging Loporrit at the Cholorophosgrot.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SEQ_02<tab>Livrer ce qui vous a été demandé au Loporrite leste

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the foraging Loporrit at the Chlorophosgrot.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_TODO_00<tab>Parler au Loporrite leste, devant la grotte aux chlorophoi

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was just thinking about how important this endeavor of ours truly is. You see, one of our fellow Ways was recently inspired to pursue a dream of their own─one they never would have discovered if not for Cookingway's example.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>Les Loporrites essayant de réaliser leurs rêves sous l'influence de Cookingway sont toujours plus nombreux. Quelle joie de voir mes congénères si heureux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>In the end, that's what all of this is about─helping one another find and pursue our individual dreams. Alas, our friend was out in the midst of this pursuit, foraging for culinary ingredients, when their tools broke.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Cependant, la route vers le bonheur est parfois semée d'embûches... Je viens tout juste de recevoir un message de détresse d'un Loporrite parti à la chasse aux ingrédients<var 1D /var>: un de ses outils est cassé et il a besoin d'aide pour le réparer.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>I hate to impose, but since they refuse to return, it would do much to ease our concern if someone like you─a person well accustomed to voyages on the moon's surface─were to search for our willful friend and help them repair their equipment. You'll do it, won't you?
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>Vous qui avez une expérience du terrain incomparable, je suis sûr que vous saurez quoi faire pour lui. Il attend près de l'entrée de la grotte aux chlorophoi, vous ne pourrez pas le rater<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_005<tab>Greetings and salutations! Normally, this supporter would offer you materials, but is not currently authorized to do so!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_005<tab>Bip... En attente de requête de matériaux...

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_010<tab>Curse those mushrooms and their sturdy stems! I was just <var 1A 02 /var>trying<var 1A 01 /var> to get some <var 1A 02 /var>samples<var 1A 01 /var> and now my equipment is buggered to the star and back! ...Managingway did send you, didn't they? I would hate to have done all this ranting at some random passerby.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_010<tab>Vous<var 1D /var>! Oui, oui, vous<var 1D /var>! Je suis venu récolter des champignons évolués pour une nouvelle recette, mais mon outil a rendu l'âme<var 1D /var>! Vous pourriez me dépanner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_011<tab>Anyway, do you think you could make a blade sharp enough to cut through hardy fungi with these steel components? No need to worry about running out of materials─the supporter I brought along has plenty more where that came from!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_011<tab>Vu votre spécialité, quelques lames feront l'affaire<var 1D /var>! Il vaut mieux en avoir d'avance, héhé<var 1D /var>! Je vous fournis les matériaux, mais l'unité d'assistance pourra vous ravitailler en cas de pépin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_012<tab>Anyway, after nearly losing a paw from my blade rebounding off of those infernal fungi, a nonslip handle has quickly risen to the top of my priorities. Would you be able to make one with these materials? The supporter I brought along has plenty more where that came from, should you need it!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_012<tab>Vu votre spécialité, quelques manches feront l'affaire<var 1D /var>! Il vaut mieux en avoir d'avance, héhé<var 1D /var>! Je vous fournis les matériaux, mais l'unité d'assistance pourra vous ravitailler en cas de pépin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_013<tab>Anyway, I can't have my tool jamming on me again. Do you think you could prepare some oil with these materials so I can ensure the blade is in perfect form? The supporter I brought along has plenty more where that came from, should you need it!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_013<tab>Vu votre spécialité, quelques fioles d'huile d'entretien feront l'affaire<var 1D /var>! Il vaut mieux en avoir d'avance, héhé<var 1D /var>! Je vous fournis les matériaux, mais l'unité d'assistance pourra vous ravitailler en cas de pépin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_014<tab>When you've finished, please hand the item here so I can complete the repairs. I'm not leaving until I've cut out every last tasty ilm of those mushrooms!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_014<tab>Ah, je ne voudrais pas vous presser, mais plus vite vous m'apporterez ça, plus vite je pourrai aller récolter mes champignons<var 1D /var>! Allez, à vous de jouer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_015<tab><beep> You need materials? Are you sure you do? Have you checked your pockets and everything? Because scans indicate that you still have a perfectly sufficient amount.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_015<tab>Analyse de vos sacs en cours... Bzzz... Ravitaillement inutile pour le moment.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_016<tab><beep> You need materials? Are you sure you do? Have you checked your pockets and everything? Because scans indicate that you still have a perfectly sufficient amount.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_016<tab>Analyse de vos sacs en cours... Bzzz... Ravitaillement inutile pour le moment.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_017<tab><beep> You need materials? Are you sure you do? Have you checked your pockets and everything? Because scans indicate that you still have a perfectly sufficient amount.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_017<tab>Analyse de vos sacs en cours... Bzzz... Ravitaillement inutile pour le moment.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_018<tab><beep> Facing a dearth of materials, are you? Never fear─this supporter is happy to serve! Now, if you'd just hold out your hands...
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_018<tab>Analyse de vos sacs en cours... Bzzz... Ravitaillement terminé.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_019<tab><beep> Facing a dearth of materials, are you? Never fear─this supporter is happy to serve! Now, if you'd just hold out your hands...
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_019<tab>Analyse de vos sacs en cours... Bzzz... Ravitaillement terminé.

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_020<tab><beep> Facing a dearth of materials, are you? Never fear─this supporter is happy to serve! Now, if you'd just hold out your hands...
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_SUPPORTER04703_000_020<tab>Analyse de vos sacs en cours... Bzzz... Ravitaillement terminé.
TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_025<tab>Alors, alors<var 1D /var>? Vous avez ce dont j'ai besoin<var 1D /var>? Vite, montrez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_026<tab>This is perfect! Once I've installed it into my equipment, I should have no problem collecting samples of those deceptively firm fungi! And when I have...I shall make a dish the likes of which Cookingway himself has never even <var 1A 02 /var>dreamed<var 1A 01 /var> of making!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_026<tab>Mais oui<var 1D /var>! Merci merci merci<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, à moi les meilleurs champignons pour la nouvelle recette que je voulais essayer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_027<tab>Ahem. Well, I'm going to go chop up some mushrooms. You should head back and let Managingway know everything here is just fine. This...might take a while.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_LOPORRIT04703_000_027<tab>Je vais en avoir pour un petit moment dans la grotte, alors ne m'attendez pas<var 1D /var>! Allez plutôt dire à Managingway que tout est rentré dans l'ordre, voulez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>Welcome back! I take it our foraging friend is okay?
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>Vous revoilà<var 1D /var>! Alors, est-ce que notre ami Loporrite mal outillé est tiré d'affaire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>I neglected to mention this earlier, but their dream is to cook undiscovered species of fungi, and enjoy the twofold thrills of exterminating harmful types of mushrooms whilst simultaneously discovering delectable new ones. And, as I understand, mushroom cuisine is also rather popular on Etheirys.
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>Pour tout vous dire, son rêve est de démocratiser l'utilisation des champignons évolués dans notre ali<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion. Il espère ainsi mettre à profit non seulement leur goût particulier, mais aussi leurs propriétés antibactériennes méconnues<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>Whether they produce a new mouthwatering recipe, or eradicate harmful fungal species first... I suppose we can't complain either way!
target: TEXT_BANLOP117_04703_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>Est-ce que ses recettes sauront satisfaire nos papilles de plus en plus exigeantes, cela reste à voir... Mais en attendant, nous devons tout faire pour l'encourager. Encore merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!
